rules: Never center text by default; use left alignment for organic flow.
Use 'The Tetris Grid' logic: Mix Hero (col-span-8), Square (col-span-4), and Tall (row-span-2) blocks.
Use 'cardless' designs or subtle borders for data density.
Primary actions (Accept, Complete) must be fixed at bottom.
Map takes 60% of screen height in navigation mode.

universal_guidelines: FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js for all React components (NOT .tsx).
THEME: 'Organic & Earthy' - Use the specified color palette. Avoid generic 'tech blue'.
CONTRAST: Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards. Use dark charcoal (#1A1A1A) for text on light backgrounds.
SPACING: Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) to create breathing room. Avoid cramped layouts.
ANIMATION: Add micro-interactions to all buttons and cards (hover:scale, hover:shadow). Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions if possible.
SHADOWS: Use colored shadows (shadow-primary/10) instead of pure black shadows for a warmer feel.
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
NO GRADIENTS: Do not use dark gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
GLASSMORPHISM: Use backdrop-blur-xl with bg-white/80 for overlays and sticky headers.
MOBILE FIRST: Ensure all layouts stack correctly on mobile. Images max-height 80vh on mobile.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the 'Second Serve' food rescue app. Follow the 'Organic & Earthy' design system defined above. Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Ensure the 'Driver Dashboard' is mobile-optimized with large touch targets. Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Create components in .js files. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the landing page and 'High Density Grid' for dashboards.
